summary: [ADULT MOD] Adds decently sized man-bits to the werewolves. Animal or Human version available.
descriptionHtml:
[b]THIS IS AN ADULT MOD. IF YOU DON'T LIKE SUCH CONTENT, SKIP IT![/b]


This mod brings an end to the child-safe blank groin of the Werewolves and adds proper-sized male bits to it instead.

[b]Two versions available:[/b] Naturalistic canine animal penis as well as a human penis version!

Each version uses it's own set of handpainted textures + custom mesh.

[color=red][b][size=16]Update:[/size] [size=4]Female players / characters (yes, including Aela) are no longer affected by this mod!
You can now toggle the mod/version you want from the Skyrim Launcher under the DATA/FILES option [/size][/b][/color]

[color=red]To anyone experiencing a rare bug that your animal version will be invisible in the game: Please use the optional, old version you find in the files section of this mod. It contains version 0.2 of the animal wang mesh, which does NOT rely on any .esp files and thus won't be buggy. It will affect females however. You need to remove the current version of the mod before you may use the old one.[/color]

_______________________________

* Requirements
* Installation
* Activation / Deactivation
* Uninstallation
* Known Bugs, Issues, Incompatibilities
* Savegames

_______________________________



[u]- REQUIREMENTS -[/u]

Skyrim!
No other requirements.
[color=yellow]If you have an older version of this mod installed, please delete the old files before you install the new mod![/color]


[u]- INSTALLATION -[/u]

Extract this archive into your Skyrim\Data\ folder.

OR select the two folders included in this archive and drag them into your Skyrim\Data\ folder,
confirm the warning that the folders already exists with "Yes, All" should you be asked what to do.
Move the Derrax_Male_Werewolf_ANIMALpenis.esp and Derrax_Male_Werewolf_HUMANpenis.esp into your
\Data folder as well.


[u]- Activation / Deactivation[/u]

Activation:

In the SKYRIM LAUNCHER, go to the DATA FILE option and tick the checkbox of the version that you want to activate! That's it!

[b]Only one version (animal junk OR human junk) can be active in the game at the same time.[/b] MAKE SURE that only one option is checked, not both!


Deactivation:

To deactivate the mod, simply uncheck both checkboxes!




[u]- UNINSTALLATION -[/u]


Remove the files you extracted to / manually placed in the folders. Refer to the included readme.


[u]- BUGS, ISSUES, INCOMPATIBILITIES -[/u]


No bugs are currently known.
The mod uses it's own custom texture files and does not collide with texture-changes that
have been made to the textures of the Werewolf by other mods.
Mods that change the bodymesh of the Werewolf MIGHT collide with this mod.


[u]- SAVEGAMES -[/u]


No special precautions necessary. After removing the mod/files, any Werewolves
found in your savegames will revert back to it's default look.


A full readme is included in the archive!


_____________________________________________________
[color=yellow][b]To-Do List:[/b][/color]

[i]You can suggest more things for this in the comments[/i]

[list]
[*] Fix rare problem with the animal .esp by generating a proper new one
[*] Erect versions for both animal and human junk
[*] (once Creation Kit is out) Make both variants appear on werewolves in the game
[*] (once Creation Kit is out) add some mod-specific ingredients that can be collected from dead werewolves ;)
[*] more hairy version - later on
[/list]




_____________________________________________________

Change log

Version 0.3

Consolidated previously separate versions/archives into one
!FEMALE CHARACTERS do no longer get male genitals attached
The mod can now be toggled via .esp files in the Skyrim Launcher

Version 0.2

Fixed Black eyes on both versions, caused by incorrectly set vertex colors.

Version 0.1

Initial release.
